claim_evidence: the obvious performance improvement for query translation can be obtained , which is very beneficial to CLIR and can improve the whole retrieval performance
evidence: It can be observed from the experimental results on the data sets of Text Retrieval Evaluation Conference ( TREC ) that the obvious performance improvement for query translation can be obtained , which is very beneficial to CLIR and can improve the whole retrieval performance .
text: It can be observed from the experimental results on the data sets of Text Retrieval Evaluation Conference ( TREC ) that the obvious performance improvement for query translation can be obtained , which is very beneficial to CLIR and can improve the whole retrieval performance .
